name: Formula Evaluator
body:
# Formula Evaluator

Inspired by EvalEx the goal of this small library is to offer a simple way how to organize complex formulas in a readable way, without loose too much performance.

Example:
`FormulaEvaluator.create("a * b + c ^ 3")
                 .with("a", BigDecimal.valueOf(10))
                 .with("b", BigDecimal.valueOf(5.5))
                 .with("c", BigDecimal.valueOf(3))
                 .evalPrecise();`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
